name: That Retro Guy
description:
Run on an endless parkour inside a retrowave world with beautiful tracks on the background! Use powerups to your advantage, collect cassettes to upgrade powerups and keep pushing for a higher score!


We are glad to announce that our first title ThatDeadGuy recieved a big update and relabeled as That Retro Guy!  Here is a list of updates:

- Visual overhaul in general.
- Renewed character model and animations.
- Two new powerups.
- Renewed decorations.
- Neo-Tokyo themed level design.
- Bug fixes.
- 5 new skins which will automatically unlock as you score higher.
- Optimizations for smoother game play.
- 9 New songs!

Features the amazing soundtracks made by Yunus Emre Koçak a.k.a. bel4ride and other amazing musicians!
